name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Clair Douglas BLAIR

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Clair Douglas BLAIR.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Mercer County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Harry A. Penich, Asst. Dist. Atty., Mercer, for appellant.
Richard A. Peterson, Peterson & Gula, Greenville, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
421 A.2d 214
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Clair Douglas BLAIR.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 3, 1980.
Decided Nov. 3, 1980.
Harry A. Penich, Asst. Dist. Atty., Mercer, for appellant.
Richard A. Peterson, Peterson & Gula, Greenville, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
